name: Changcheng No. 5 Coal Mine
company_mentions: 鄂托克前旗长城五号矿业有限公司 (Otog Front Banner Changcheng No.5 Mining Company)

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E9%84%82%E6%89%98%E5%85%8B%E5%89%8D%E6%97%97%E9%95%8F%E5%9F%8E%E4%B8%87%E5%8F%B7%E7%9F%BF%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%E9%95%BF%E5%9F%8E%E4%B8%87%E5%8F%B7%E7%85%A4%E7%9F%BF. The Changcheng No. 5 Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Otog Front Banner of Ordos City, Inner Mongolia, with a construction scale of 1.8 million tons per year

province: 内蒙古自治区 (Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region)

operators: 鄂托克前旗长城五号矿业有限公司 (Otog Front Banner Changcheng No.5 Mining Company)
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Otog Front Banner Changcheng No.5 Mining Company, which is owned by Shandong Energy and other stakeholders.
